definitions.title: n.[ m.]
definitions.body: a precious stone in h.p.'s breast-plate Ex 28:19, Ex 39:12 (√ and mng. dub.; LXX ligu/rion, Joseph:Ant. iii. 7, 5 li/gurov, Vulgate ligurius, and this (= lugkou/rion, lyncurion ?) compared with carbuncle Plin:NH viii. 57 (38); identif. with amber Demostratus in Plin:NH xxxvii 11(2), or with jacinth (Rev 21:20) Braun:De Vest. Sacerd. ii. 14 Winer:RWBi. 332; cf. further, Di:Ex 28:19).
